sourcesContent:
import './index.css' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faStar } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import getProduct from './handler/getProductHandler' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' export function Detail() { const id = useParams().id const product = getProduct(id) return (
{/* Head Name */}

{product.brand}

{product.name}

New | Item {product._id}

{/* Stars */}

(102)

{/* Description */}

{product.description}

{/* Price And Button*/}

{product.price}

) }
